title: "Neural Net Art"
content:
Welcome to our website, where we showcase beautiful and thought-provoking art inspired by neural networks. Our collection features a variety of styles and mediums, all united by their use of cutting-edge technology to create stunning visuals.

Whether you're an artist looking for inspiration, a tech enthusiast interested in the latest developments in machine learning, or simply someone who appreciates the beauty of abstract art, you'll find something to love here. Explore our gallery, read our blog, and join our community of like-minded individuals who share your passion for creativity and innovation.

With our simple yet striking wallpaper featuring a graphic of a neural network against a backdrop of complementary colors, we hope to inspire you to think outside the box and embrace the limitless possibilities of this exciting new field. So come on in, make yourself at home, and let your imagination run wild!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a neural network, against a background of complementary colors."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
